Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes the city of Dunkirk interim finance authority; repealer
Summary: Establishes the city of Dunkirk interim finance authority; provides for its functions, powers and duties; repeals the city of Dunkirk fiscal recovery act.
LawCode: Add Art 10-D Title 1-A §§3750 - 3772, Pub Auth L; rpld Part DD, Chap 56 of 2024
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the city of Dunkirk interim finance authority; and to repeal the city of Dunkirk fiscal recovery act
